discussion_comments.comment_body:
The new 'PREVENT_FOCUS_DISRUPTION' entry still uses English text for both its name and description. For consistency with other localized entries, please provide proper Traditional Chinese translations.

<sup>This comment was generated because it violated a code review rule: [irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX](https://app.ellipsis.dev/RooCodeInc/code-review/rules?id=irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX).</sup>

Typographical consistency: The translation for 'collapse' appears as "Ciutkan daftar file" in the header section but as "Diciutkan" in the accessibility section. Consider using a consistent term (e.g., "Diciutkan daftar file") for clarity.
```suggestion
		"collapse": "Diciutkan daftar file"
```

<sup>This comment was generated because it violated a code review rule: [irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX](https://app.ellipsis.dev/RooCodeInc/code-review/rules?id=irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX).</sup>

The new keys use inconsistent terminology for diagnostic messages. For example, the label uses "डायग्नोस्टिक्स" while the description and other messages use "डायग्नोस्टिक" and "नैदानिक". Please standardize the terminology to ensure consistency throughout the file.

<sup>This comment was generated because it violated a code review rule: [irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX](https://app.ellipsis.dev/RooCodeInc/code-review/rules?id=irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX).</sup>

"vscodeLmDescription": "L'API du modèle de langage VS Code vous permet d'exécuter des modèles fournis par d'autres extensions VS Code (y compris, mais sans s'y limiter, GitHub Copilot). +		"archgwPreferenceConfigUse": "Entrez une configuration YAML valide pour le routage basé sur les préférences d'Arch Gateway. La configuration doit inclure le nom de la route, l'ID du modèle et les préférences d'utilisation. Par exemple:",
+		"archgwPreferenceConfigDesc": "Assurez-vous que l'ID du modèle existe dans votre configuration d'arch gateway.",

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Typographical consistency: The term "Arch Gateway" is used in the previous string (line 226) with capital letters, but here it appears as "arch gateway" in lowercase. For consistency and clarity, consider capitalizing it consistently.
```suggestion

```

In 'archgwPreferenceConfigUse', the term is written as "Arch Gateway" (Latin script), whereas in 'archgwPreferenceConfigDesc' it appears as "アーチゲートウェイ" (Japanese script). Please consider using a consistent naming convention for clarity.
```suggestion

```

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Typographical consistency: The error message for 'vectorDimensionNotDeterminedOpenAiCompatible' uses “埋め込み次元” in the explanation, whereas elsewhere (e.g., in 'vectorDimensionNotDetermined') it refers to “ベクター次元”. Consider using one consistent term if they refer to the same concept.
```suggestion
		"vectorDimensionNotDeterminedOpenAiCompatible": "プロバイダー '{{provider}}' のモデル '{{modelId}}' のベクター次元を決定できませんでした。OpenAI互換プロバイダー設定で「ベクター次元」が正しく設定されていることを確認してください。",
```

<sup>This comment was generated because it violated a code review rule: [irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX](https://app.ellipsis.dev/RooCodeInc/code-review/rules?id=irule_C0ez7Rji6ANcGkkX).</sup>
